Instruction:
Task Description: Create a Kafka producer wrapper class in Java that simplifies sending JSON data to Kafka topics.

Class Description: The KafkaProducerWrapper class provides a convenient interface for producing messages to Kafka topics. It handles producer creation, message serialization, and error handling internally.

Attributes:
- kafkaProducer: Producer<Long, String> - The underlying Kafka producer instance
- kafkaBrokers: String - Comma-separated list of Kafka broker addresses
- gson: Gson - JSON serializer/deserializer instance

Methods:
- createKafkaProducer() -> Producer<Long, String> - Creates and configures a new Kafka producer instance with the specified broker addresses and serializers
- send2Kafka(JsonElement jsonElement, String topicName) -> void - Serializes the JSON element and sends it to the specified Kafka topic
- close() -> void - Properly closes the Kafka producer to release resources
